participant_1.background:
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.
i have tried 35 different types of beer in my lifetime.
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
my favorite season is duck hunting season.

participant_2.background:
I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

content.text: Hi there! I am trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible. How about you?
Hello! That's nice of you. I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
Oh wow! That's really cool. I am not very athletic, but I think it's great that you're able to inspire kids to be healthy.
Thank you! It's very rewarding. I am trying to get my brothers to join me, but they're not very interested.
That's too bad. I'm sure they'd have a lot of fun.
I love summer! I love going to the beach and swimming. I also love spending time outside with my family.
That sounds lovely. I love summer too. I like going camping and fishing.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been camping before, but it sounds like it would be a great experience.
It is! It's a great way to get away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.
I can imagine. I think I'd like to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun
